name: The Entertainer
text:
2 "Performapal or "Odd-Eyes" monsters.
Once per turn, you can target 1 "Performapal" or "Odd-eyes" card in a Pendulum Zone: Add 1 "Performapal" or "Odd-eyes" monster from your Deck to your hand with a level lower than that cardâ€™s Pendulum Scale. If a "Performapal" monster is Summoned to a zone this card points to: you can destroy 1 card on the field. You can only use this effect of "The Entertainer" once per turn.
